item.title: Map Reduce
item.description: Map-Reduce Before getting into MapReduce, let’s first understand what distributed systems are — and why they’re widely used. Imagine You have some work that can be done by a computer. What do you do? Easy — you just assign the work to your computer. Now the work gets harder, and it’s taking longer to complete. What do you do? Simple — buy a better CPU, GPU, more RAM. Upgrade your computer.
